author: Bronwyn S
title: Perfect location, perfect for familes
text: we loved this hotel and thoroughly recommend it. The location is amazing - in the middle of a hutong, and a short walk to a metro station. It has a fascinating history as a courtyard house and has maintained the unique architectural character. The family room was extremely comfortable, well appointed and furnished with lovely antique furniture. The staff - especially Indigo - were friendly and extremely helpful. It is near some great restaurants that were perfect for families. The hotel also has a comfortable bar where food is served.
